verses.translation: Ukuri kudakumirwa (umunsi w’izuka).
Ukuri kudakumirwa ni iki?
Ni iki kizakubwira ukuri kudakumirwa?
Aba Thamudu n’aba Adi bahinyuye umunsi w’imperuka.
Aba Thamudu borekeshejwe urusaku ndengakamere.

verses.arabic_text: وَأَمَّا عَادٞ فَأُهۡلِكُواْ بِرِيحٖ صَرۡصَرٍ عَاتِيَةٖ
verses.translation: Naho aba Adi borekeshwa umuyaga uvuza ubuhuha, usenya.

verses.arabic_text: سَخَّرَهَا عَلَيۡهِمۡ سَبۡعَ لَيَالٖ وَثَمَٰنِيَةَ أَيَّامٍ حُسُومٗاۖ فَتَرَى ٱلۡقَوۡمَ فِيهَا صَرۡعَىٰ كَأَنَّهُمۡ أَعۡجَازُ نَخۡلٍ خَاوِيَةٖ
verses.translation: (Allah) yawubateje mu gihe cy’amajoro arindwi n’amanywa umunani bikurikiranye. Wabonaga abantu ari imirambo irambaraye imeze nk’ingiga z’ibiti by’imitende (byaranduwe) birangaye (birimo ubusa mo imbere).
Ese urabona hari n’umwe wasigaye muri bo?

verses.arabic_text: وَجَآءَ فِرۡعَوۡنُ وَمَن قَبۡلَهُۥ وَٱلۡمُؤۡتَفِكَٰتُ بِٱلۡخَاطِئَةِ
verses.translation: Farawo n’ababayeho mbere ye ndetse n’abo mu midugudu yabirinduwe (abantu ba Loti) bakoze ibyaha,

verses.arabic_text: فَعَصَوۡاْ رَسُولَ رَبِّهِمۡ فَأَخَذَهُمۡ أَخۡذَةٗ رَّابِيَةً
verses.translation: Nuko bigomeka ku Ntumwa ya Nyagasani wabo, maze (Allah) abahanisha ibihano bikaze.

verses.arabic_text: إِنَّا لَمَّا طَغَا ٱلۡمَآءُ حَمَلۡنَٰكُمۡ فِي ٱلۡجَارِيَةِ
verses.translation: Mu by’ukuri ubwo amazi yarengaga inkombe (mu gihe cy’umwuzure wo ku bwa Nuhu, abamwemeye) twabatwaye mu bwato.

verses.arabic_text: لِنَجۡعَلَهَا لَكُمۡ تَذۡكِرَةٗ وَتَعِيَهَآ أُذُنٞ وَٰعِيَةٞ
verses.translation: Kugira ngo tubigire urwibutso kuri mwe ndetse n’amatwi yumva abizirikane.

verses.arabic_text: فَإِذَا نُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِ نَفۡخَةٞ وَٰحِدَةٞ
verses.translation: Ubwo impanda izavuzwa inshuro imwe (ya mbere).

verses.arabic_text: وَحُمِلَتِ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَٱلۡجِبَالُ فَدُكَّتَا دَكَّةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗ
verses.translation: Isi n’imisozi bigaterurwa, bigahondwa inshuro imwe.
Kuri uwo munsi, imperuka izaba igeze.
N’ikirere kizasatagurika, maze uwo munsi kibe cyoroshye (ku buryo cyakwiyasagura).

verses.arabic_text: وَٱلۡمَلَكُ عَلَىٰٓ أَرۡجَآئِهَاۚ وَيَحۡمِلُ عَرۡشَ رَبِّكَ فَوۡقَهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ ثَمَٰنِيَةٞ
verses.translation: N’abamalayika bazaba bakizengurutse (ikirere) impande zacyo. Kandi kuri uwo munsi abamalayika umunani biyongera kuri abo bazaba bateruye Ar’shi[1] ya Nyagasani wawe.

verses.arabic_text: يَوۡمَئِذٖ تُعۡرَضُونَ لَا تَخۡفَىٰ مِنكُمۡ خَافِيَةٞ
verses.translation: Uwo munsi muzahagarikwa (imbere ya Allah). Nta kintu na kimwe cyanyu kizayoberana.

verses.arabic_text: فَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِيَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ بِيَمِينِهِۦ فَيَقُولُ هَآؤُمُ ٱقۡرَءُواْ كِتَٰبِيَهۡ
verses.translation: Bityo, uzahabwa igitabo cye mu kuboko kw’iburyo, azavuga (aratira abandi) agira ati “Nimuze musome igitabo cyanjye.”
Rwose njye nari nzi neza ko nzahura n’ibarura ryanjye nk’iri (kubera ibikorwa byiza nakoze).
Azaba mu buzima bw’umunezero,
Mu busitani buhebuje,
Imbuto zabwo zizaba ziri bugufi (yabo).

verses.arabic_text: كُلُواْ وَٱشۡرَبُواْ هَنِيٓـَٔۢا بِمَآ أَسۡلَفۡتُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأَيَّامِ ٱلۡخَالِيَةِ
verses.translation: (Bazabwirwa bati) “Nimurye munanywe kandi muryoherwe, ibyo ni ukubera ibyo mwakoze mu minsi yahise (mukiri ku isi).”

verses.arabic_text: وَأَمَّا مَنۡ أُوتِيَ كِتَٰبَهُۥ بِشِمَالِهِۦ فَيَقُولُ يَٰلَيۡتَنِي لَمۡ أُوتَ كِتَٰبِيَهۡ
verses.translation: Naho uzahabwa igitabo cye mu kuboko kw’ibumoso, azavuga (yicuza n’agahinda kenshi) ati “iyaba ntari mpawe iki gitabo cyanjye!”,
Sinamenye iby’ibarura ryanjye!
Iyaba urupfu (rwanjye napfuye mva ku isi) rwari rwo rwa burundu.
Umutungo wanjye nta cyo wamariye!
N’ubutware bwanjye bwabaye imfabusa (bwancitse).
(Abarinzi b’umuriro bazabwirwa bati) “Mumufate mumubohe,
Maze mumutwikire mu muriro,

verses.arabic_text: ثُمَّ فِي سِلۡسِلَةٖ ذَرۡعُهَا سَبۡعُونَ ذِرَاعٗا فَٱسۡلُكُوهُ
verses.translation: Nyuma mumuboheshe umunyururu ufite uburebure bwa Dhira’a[1] mirongo irindwi.

verses.arabic_text: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: Mu by’ukuri ntiyemeraga Allah w’ikirenga.
Nta n’ubwo yajyaga ashishikariza (abantu) kugaburira abakene.
None hano uyu munsi nta nshuti ari bugire (yamuvuganira cyangwa ngo imurinde ibihano)
Nta n’ibyo kurya (ari buhabwe) uretse amashyira (y’abantu bo mu muriro),
Nta bandi (bahabwa) ibyo biribwa uretse abanyabyaha.”
Rwose ndahiye ibyo mureba,
N’ibyo mutareba.
Mu by’ukuri iyi (Qur’an) ni ijambo (rya Allah risomwa) n’Intumwa yubahitse (Muhamadi).

verses.arabic_text: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوۡلِ شَاعِرٖۚ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تُؤۡمِنُونَ
verses.translation: Ntabwo ari imvugo y’umusizi. Dore ko mwemera gake!

verses.arabic_text: وَلَا بِقَوۡلِ كَاهِنٖۚ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.translation: Nta n’ubwo ari imvugo y’umupfumu. Ariko mwibuka gake!
(Ahubwo ni igitabo) cyahishuwe giturutse kwa Nyagasani w’ibiremwa.
N’iyo (Muhamadi) aza kugira ibyo aduhimbira (tutavuze),
Twari kumufatisha imbaraga n’ukuboko kw’iburyo.
Maze tukamuca umutsi w’umujyana w’ibanze (uvana amaraso mu mutima uyohereza hose mu mubiri).

verses.arabic_text: فَمَا مِنكُم مِّنۡ أَحَدٍ عَنۡهُ حَٰجِزِينَ
verses.translation: Nta n’umwe muri mwe wari kugira icyo amumarira (ngo amutabare).
Kandi mu by’ukuri (Qur’an) ni urwibutso ku bagandukira Allah.
Rwose tuzi neza ko muri mwe hari abahinyura (iyi Qur’an).
Kandi rwose (ku munsi w’imperuka, Qur’an) izaba amakuba ku bahakanyi.
Kandi mu by’ukuri (Qur’an) ni ukuri kudashidikanywaho.
Bityo, tagatifuza izina rya Nyagasani wawe, Uhambaye.
